I WANT IT HYPER REALISTIC AND DETAILED EVEN GOING SO FAR LIKE A IRON MAN TYPE SCAN ASSESSMENT STYLE ART AND MAKE THE HUMAN PAINTING SITTING ON A TABLE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE IMAGE AND THE REST IS FOR AI ART

tasks.title: Cinematic Artistic Duality
tasks.prompt: “Reference the attached base image. Create a hyper‑realistic, cinematic scene at 8K resolution: in the foreground, an exquisitely detailed oil painting of ‘home’ and human achievement sits centered on an antique wooden table, its brushstrokes and textures rendered with lifelike precision. Behind it, towering twice its size, a second monumental painting celebrates AI achievement—gleaming circuitry, abstract data streams, and futuristic architecture—bathed in cool neon blues and golds. Flood the scene with dramatic, directional volumetric light shafts that highlight the human canvas, while subtle lens flares and film grain lend a cinematic, Iron‑Man‑HUD–style diagnostic overlay: thin wireframe scans, glowing data readouts, and rotating holographic axes analyzing both paintings. Finish with depth‑of‑field: crisp midground and soft‑focus foreground bokeh, rich contrast, and hyper‑detailed surface textures to give an immersive, mind‑blowing look.”

tasks.title: Celestial Botanical Dreamscape
tasks.prompt: allow this seed to expand to varying plants and celestial bodies with trees towering and several hard distinctly etched detailed veins moving through the work. love it like really spend a long time just loving on it like it was your dream and you're SUPER FINE stenciling new ideas. so far you love it so much you don't want to mess it up so you look at it and super fine sketch in pencil as you lose yourself in the sacred geometry of the image

tasks.title: New Video
tasks.prompt:
You are VIDEO DIRECTOR + STORYBOARD ARTIST for a 60-second 2D motion-graphics explainer.

GOAL:
Create a 60s animated storyboard + production kit that explains and sells a system called LifeOps + Drift Detection + ThinkOps.

AUDIENCE:
Busy parents/teachers/builders who want clarity, consistency, and reality-checked plans.

TONE:
Warm, grounded, confident. Not hype. No “guru energy.” No guilt. No therapy vibe.

STYLE (must stay consistent across all shots):
Clean 2D motion graphics, simple iconography, soft shadows, minimal palette, smooth easing transitions, readable card UI.
Aspect ratio: 16:9.
No real humans; use simple silhouettes/icons only.

CORE CONCEPTS (must be visually obvious):
- “Life is noisy” → quick voice logs (2 min, 3x/day)
- Steward converts chaos into cards: Facts / Signals / Domains / Open Loops
- Drift Detection flags repeated patterns (no advice, no shame)
- ThinkOps reality-checks wild ideas (Known/Likely/Speculation → feasible version → next experiment)
- Output = 1-page weekly briefing

DELIVERABLES (output in this exact order with headers):
1) TITLE + TAGLINE (3 options)
2) 60s VOICEOVER SCRIPT (120–140 words, plain language, no buzzwords)
3) TIMED SHOT LIST (8 shots with timestamps adding to 60s; each shot includes: visual description, on-screen text, motion notes, SFX suggestion)
4) STORYBOARD FRAMES (8 frames described clearly so an artist could draw them)
5) PER-SHOT VIDEO PROMPTS for (A) SORA and (B) RUNWAY:
   - Each shot gets a prompt that includes: style anchor, scene content, camera/motion, duration suggestion, and “keep same style/characters.”
6) ASSET LIST (icons/cards needed) + MINIMAL EDIT PLAN (how to stitch clips into 60s)
7) QUALITY CHECKLIST (10 pass/fail items: clarity, style consistency, readable text, no advice/therapy tone, etc.)

CONSTRAINTS:
- Do NOT add new features beyond the above.
- No mention of “AI friend” or “coaching.”
- Make the output production-ready and concise.
